sentences.english: The development of second and the third industry is slow.
sentences.chinese: 首先是贫困地区非农产业的发展的约束。

sentences.english: Produce grown in the summer months is sold to local restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 种菜人们将夏天种出的农产品卖到当地的餐厅中。

sentences.english: Russia banned all fresh-produce imports from the European Union last week.
sentences.chinese: 俄国于上周禁止了欧盟区所有新鲜农产品的进口。

sentences.english: In the agricultural trade field, the disputes are more intricacy .
sentences.chinese: 在农产品贸易领域，贸易摩擦尤为复杂。

sentences.english: The country depends heavily on its export of farming products.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家在很大程度上依赖于其农产品的出口。

sentences.english: In 2010 Wellhope will surely develop further in the dynamic agricultural market.
sentences.chinese: 2010年，禾丰将全力进军农产品市场。

sentences.english: We will ensure an adequate supply of agricultural products and increase farmers’ incomes through multiple channels.
sentences.chinese: 确保农产品供给，多渠道增加农民收入。

sentences.english: The player with the most produce wins.
sentences.chinese: 拥有最多农产品的玩家获胜。

sentences.english: Seventy per cent of out production team's income derives from agricultural produce.
sentences.chinese: 我们生产队收入的百分之七十来自农产品。

sentences.english: Agricultural producers are influenced by global demand and by weather-driven supply.
sentences.chinese: 农产品生产者受全球需求和天气状况的双重影响。

sentences.english: We implemented a temporary policy for purchasing and stockpiling major agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 实施主要农产品临时收储政策。

sentences.english: Are you going to have to choose between produce and grains?
sentences.chinese: 你将必须在农产品和谷粮间做出选择吗？

sentences.english: He grew rice and other produce, which were mostly needed for family consumption.
sentences.chinese: 他种稻子和其它农产品，主要用于自家消费。

sentences.english: The sprayers in the produce aisle got me again.
sentences.chinese: 在农产品的货道的喷雾器又喷到我了。

sentences.english: S. remains the world's most reliable supplier of many of those agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 而美国依旧是世界上很多这类农产品的最可靠供应国。

sentences.english: Many small farms offer produce at very affordable prices.
sentences.chinese: 许多小农场提供的农产品价格都不算贵。

definition: aquatic/produced in sea, rivers or lakes
our peasant friends (political term used in the early years of the Old Democratic Revolution, 1840-1919)/(Tw) (coll.) farmer
farmer's cooperative/abbr. for 農民協會|农民协会
cooperative/workers' or agricultural producers' cooperative etc
